name: amp-tube
description: A simple YouTube search engine and viewer app, implemented in AMP

scripts.build: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && node build/build.js > docs/manifest.webmanifest && imagemin src/*.{webp,png,svg} --out-dir=docs && html-minifier --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --collapse-whitespace --minify-css 1 -o docs/index.html src/index.html

author: Thomas Steiner <steiner.thomas@gmail.com> (http://blog.tomayac.com/)
